com.samsung.android.sdk.pen.engine

Class SpenContextMenuItemInfo

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.samsung.android.sdk.pen.engine.SpenContextMenuItemInfo

  • public class SpenContextMenuItemInfo
extends Object
    Menu Item class for Context Menu. The ContextMenuItemInfo is the basic format for each menu item.
    By setting the SpenContextMenuItemInfo(int id, String name, boolean enable), can easily define a menu item accordingly.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      Drawable drawableBackgroundNormal
      Background image for normal state of context menu item.
      Drawable drawableBackgroundPressed
      Background image for pressed state of context menu item.
      Drawable drawableDisableItem
      Image for disabled context menu item.
      Drawable drawableNormalItem
      Image for normal context menu item.
      boolean enable
      Enabled state.
      int id
      Menu item ID.
      String name
      Menu item string.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      SpenContextMenuItemInfo()
      basic ContextMenuItemInfo constructor
      SpenContextMenuItemInfo(int id, Drawable drawableNormalItem, Drawable drawableDisableItem, Drawable drawableBackgroundNormal, Drawable drawableBackgroundPressed, String name, boolean enable)
      Creates an SpenContextMenuItemInfo instance, with the specified menu item name and ID, an image for the normal state, an image for the disabled state, a background image for the normal state, and a background image for the pressed state.

      Creates an SpenContextMenuItemInfo instance, with the specified menu item name and ID, an image for the normal state, a background image for the normal state, and a background image for the pressed state.values.

      Creates an SpenContextMenuItemInfo instance, with the specified menu item name and ID, and an image for the normal state,

      • SpenContextMenuItemInfo

        public SpenContextMenuItemInfo(int id,
                       String name,
                       boolean enable)
        Creates an SpenContextMenuItemInfo instance, with the specified menu item name and ID.
        Parameters:
        id - The menu item ID.
        name - The menu item name.
        enable - Set to true to enable the menu item, set to false to disable the menu item.
        See Also:
        SpenContextMenuItemInfo()

      • SpenContextMenuItemInfo

        public SpenContextMenuItemInfo(int id,
                       Drawable drawableItem,
                       String name,
                       boolean enable)
        Creates an SpenContextMenuItemInfo instance, with the specified menu item name and ID, and an image for the normal state,
        Parameters:
        id - The menu item ID.
        drawableItem - The menu item image for the normal state.
        name - The menu item name.
        enable - Set to true to enable the menu item, set to false to disable the menu item.
        See Also:
        SpenContextMenuItemInfo()

      • SpenContextMenuItemInfo

        public SpenContextMenuItemInfo(int id,
                       Drawable drawableItem,
                       Drawable drawableBackgroundNormal,
                       Drawable drawableBackgroundPressed,
                       String name,
                       boolean enable)
        Creates an SpenContextMenuItemInfo instance, with the specified menu item name and ID, an image for the normal state, a background image for the normal state, and a background image for the pressed state.values.
        Parameters:
        id - The menu item ID.
        drawableItem - The menu item image for the normal state.
        drawableBackgroundNormal - The background image for the normal state of the context menu item.
        drawableBackgroundPressed - The background image for the pressed state of the context menu item.
        name - The menu item name.
        enable - Set to true to enable the menu item, set to false to disable the menu item.
        See Also:
        SpenContextMenuItemInfo()

      • SpenContextMenuItemInfo

        public SpenContextMenuItemInfo(int id,
                       Drawable drawableNormalItem,
                       Drawable drawableDisableItem,
                       Drawable drawableBackgroundNormal,
                       Drawable drawableBackgroundPressed,
                       String name,
                       boolean enable)
        Creates an SpenContextMenuItemInfo instance, with the specified menu item name and ID, an image for the normal state, an image for the disabled state, a background image for the normal state, and a background image for the pressed state.
        Parameters:
        id - The menu item ID.
        drawableNormalItem - The menu item image for the normal state.
        drawableDisableItem - The menu item image for the disabled state.
        drawableBackgroundNormal - The background image for the normal state of the context menu item.
        drawableBackgroundPressed - The background image for the pressed state of the context menu item.
        name - The menu item name.
        enable - Set to true to enable the menu item, set to false to disable the menu item.
        See Also:
        SpenContextMenuItemInfo()
